question.text: According to the Central Pollution Control Board PM 2.5 are responsible for causing the greatest harm to human health. PM 2.5 stands for

options.text: Particulate matter which are 2.5 micrometers or less in diameter
Particulate matter which are 2.5 micrometers or more in diameter
Particulate matter which are 2.5 nanometers or less in diameter
Particulate matter which are 2.5 nanometers or more in diameter

solution.text: According to Central Pollution Control Board, PM 2.5 are responsible for causing the greatest harm to human health as these fine particulates can be inhaled deep into the lungs and can cause breathing and respiratory symptoms, irritation, inflammations and damage to the lungs and premature deaths. PM 2.5 stands for a particulate matter which is 2.5 micrometers or less in diameter.
